review: Great product, I bought the stick first to try Kodi, it worked great, then I got this one wich is faster, my main reason was to have free TV with kodi. 100% happy
author: Eduardo Oliveira, Danbury-ct

review: Best invention for TV for decades. Hopefully it will help keep the cable companies in line.

review: Love it plus the Amazon music is a plus
author: Marie

review: Ditched my cable and added sling tv.  Cut my bill in half.  Love it so far.
author: Samantha Lowry

review: Love it! So much fun to play with
author: Grace U "Grace U"

review: It is great. I would recommend this to people.
author: Amazon Customer

review: I am finding it hard to use.  I can't figure out where the thousands of free movies are.  All I seem to find cost.
author: Rita "Rita"

review: So far so good.  I spent a lot of time researching different options for streaming TV since that is the way my household is going and this one seemed to have the best package.  I didn't give it 5 stars for one because I haven't had it for very long and there are some things I would like to see added.  For one the ability for the dish anywhere app to work smoothly because I'm not completely sold on sling but that is what further research is for.
author: DMW
